mapper.select: SELECT org.id, org.org_code, org.org_name FROM gaea_org org INNER JOIN gaea_user_role_org uorg ON org.org_code = uorg.org_code INNER JOIN gaea_user u ON u.username = uorg.username WHERE org.enabled = 1 AND org.delete_flag = 0 AND u.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT uorg.role_code FROM gaea_user_role_org uorg INNER JOIN gaea_role gr ON uorg.role_code = gr.role_code WHERE uorg.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND uorg.org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND gr.enabled = 1
